long_description: This fun clip is a handy way to keep track of keys and other small items around camp or around the house. D-shaped aluminum body with spring-loaded gate makes it easy to attach essential items to a pack or belt. Includes a split-wire key ring. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: This fun clip is a handy way to keep track of keys and other small items around camp or around the house.
